additionalOutput.errorMessage: Status da linha inválido para Suspensão.

%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.executionConditionalFormula: %action% == "addSuspension" AND (%DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Pré Ativo" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Ativo" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Barrado" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Suspenso a Pedido" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Suspenso a Cadastro" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Ativo Restrito" AND %DREThroughLineNumber:StatusAtual% != "Suspenso a Roubo")
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: ResponseAction2
